TranslatedText: The Community of Madrid already knows who the owners of the supposed Caravaggio whose sale was paralyzed by the administrations. The Ansorena auction house, in charge of the sale, has communicated its name to the Ministry of Culture and within a few weeks the deadline for it to be inspected will begin. Sources from the Ministry of Culture of Madrid have confirmed to Efe, after identifying the representative of the owning family to ask him to prove his status as such, he will be given 10 days for technicians appointed by the agency to inspect the work.
